actions.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 98-590.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2465) to authorize appropriations for the Earthquake Hazards Reduction Act of 1977 and the Federal Fire Prevention and Control Act of 1974 for fiscal year 1984 and fiscal year 1985, and for other purposes.

summary.text: Sets forth the rule for the consideration of H.R. 2465 (earthquake hazards reduction and fire prevention and control funding).

titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of the bill (H.R. 2465) to authorize appropriations for the Earthquake Hazards Reduction Act of 1977 and the Federal Fire Prevention and Control Act of 1974 for fiscal year 1984 and fiscal year 1985, and for other purposes.
